item.title: Calacatta Viola Marble T Side Table
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is form, minimal, & slim. The Calacatta Viola Marble T Side Table features a square top complementing a t shape base with a void between the two legs. The marble presents a white base with dark purple veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed by Australian architectural designers. They are handmade by highly skilled stonemasons with years of experience. Each piece is made to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Lead time 4 weeks.
  • Delivered in 1-2 weeks.
  • Custom sizes & other natural stones are available upon request.
  Download Spec Sheet – PDF
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 350mm (L) x  350mm (W) x 450mm (H).
Materials: Calacatta Viola Marble.
Colour: White & Purple.
Finish: Honed or Polished.
Weight: 13kg.
Stone thickness: 2cm.

item.title: Calacatta Viola Marble Round Cone Side Table
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is form, minimal, & cone. The Calacatta Viola Round Side Table features a round top with full bullnose edging complementing a round cone shaped base. The marble presents a white base with dark purple & grey veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed by Australian architectural designers. Each piece is made to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Lead time 4 weeks.
  • Delivered in 1-2 weeks.
  • Custom sizes & other natural stones are available upon request.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 35mm (L) x 35mm (W) x 465mm (H).
Materials: Italian Calacatta Viola Marble.
Colour: White, Grey, & Purple.
Finish: Honed or Polished.
Weight: 17.5kg.
Stone thickness: 2cm.

item.title: Sculptural Raw Edge Side Table
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is sculptural. Stunning travertine side table. A one of a kind make, all of our sculptural side tables are unique & one-off. Features raw edge genuine travertine with a T base. The materiality allows for durability and gives raw texture to a room. Distinctive style and low height provide an interesting look to any space. A conversation starter if you will.

– Only 1 available. One of a kind.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 40.5cm (L) x ~23cm (W) x 42.5cm (H).
Materials: Travertine.
Colour: Beige.
Finish: Natural. Unfilled.
Weight: 11kg.
Stone thickness: 2cm.

item.title: Angled Raw Edge Side Table
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description: Stunning sculptural travertine side table. Features slim raw edge genuine travertine with an angled T base. The materiality allows for durability and gives raw texture to a room. Distinctive style of the angled legs and low height provides a interesting look to any space.

Dimension: 39cm (W) x 34cm (L) x 42cm (H)
Materials: Travertine.
Colour: Beige.
Finish: Natural. Unfilled. Smooth edging.
Weight: 9kg.
Stone thickness: 1cm.

item.description:
– ONE OF A KIND
– ONLY ONE AVAILABLE

Stunning sculptural travertine side table. Features slim raw edge genuine travertine with a T base. The materiality allows for durability and gives raw texture to a room. Unique style and low height provides a contemporary look to any space.

item.title: Small Travertine T
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Exquisite genuine natural travertine coffee table. Features a rectangular limestone top design, complementing T-shape travertine base. Unique leg design establishes a contemporary and sleek style. The materiality allows for durability and gives raw texture to a room.
– Made to order – Natural stone pattern & tone varies. Corners may be naturally chipped. – Approx. 1 -2 week lead time
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 41cm (W) x 61cm (L) x 44cm (H)
Materials: Travertine.
Colour: Classic Cream-Biege.
Finish: Natural. Unfilled. Smooth edging.
Weight: 32kg.
Top stone thickness: 3cm.
Base stone thickness: 2cm.

item.title: Cube Travertine Side Table
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Architectural genuine travertine side table. Designed as a minimal cube box form. Slim top, bottom & side design provides a contemporary and unique style. The materiality allows for durability and gives raw texture to a room.
– Made to order. – Natural stone pattern & tone varies slightly. Corners & edges may be naturally chipped. – Approx. 2-3 weeks lead time.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 40cm (W) x 40cm (L) x 44.5cm (H).
Materials: Travertine.
Colour: Cream-Beige-Off white.
Finish: Natural Unfilled.
Weight: 32kg.
Stone Thickness: 2cm.
